text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo Too bad he couldn’t get the help and support from trump and federal assistance, could have been different but trump said the COVID-19 was a hoax and didn’t promote masks almost 5 months ago and Cuomo was begging for help. Plus poor remodeling for the country by trump & others.
